title: Dorei Tensei – Sono Dorei Saikyou no Moto Ouji ni Tsuki – - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Adventurers   Age Regression   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Beautiful Female Lead   Cunning Protagonist   Magic   Male Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Reincarnation   Royalty   S*ave Protagonist
author: Karayumi   カラユミ
description: Ars, the prince of the Kingdom of Karitz, who was called the strongest wizard, died at a young age. But on the verge of death, he uses reincarnation magic. Reincarnated as Wals Sai, a slave with the best body! Wals, who became the escort of a princess in a small country, became a matchless slave who used his best body and magic to crush all enemies!>
